title: Akismet antispam plugin
extract: Akismet is a spam filtering service that filters spam from comments, trackbacks, and contact form messages. The filter works by combining information about spam captured on all participating sites, and then using those spam rules to block future spam. Akismet is offered by Automattic, the company behind WordPress.com.
extract_html: Akismet is a spam filtering service that filters spam from comments, trackbacks, and contact form messages.
